Module com.alike
Package com.alike.graphical

Class TSPGraphAnimator

java.lang.Object
javafx.animation.AnimationTimer
com.alike.graphical.TSPGraphAnimator
public class TSPGraphAnimator extends javafx.animation.AnimationTimer
Class runs at frame rate and views the graph object input during construction and then updates the canvas object input during construction to represent what the graph looks like in that during that moment. This is not synced with solution classes - it runs simultaneously.
